{{Quote|People work together when it suits 'em. They're loyal when it suits 'em. Love each other when it suits 'em. And they kill each other when it suits 'em.|Orell|The Bear and the Maiden Fair (episode)}}
'''Orell''' is a recurring character in the [[Season 3|third season]]. He is played by guest star [[Mackenzie Crook]] and debuts in [[Dark Wings, Dark Words]].<ref name=ComicCon>[http://www.westeros.org/GoT/News/Entry/Massive_Comic-Con_Casting_Reveals/ Massive Comic-Con Casting Reveals]</ref> He is a [[wildling]] and a [[warg]] who can assume the conciousness of an eagle he uses for reconnaissance.
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Orell is a [[wildling]] raider in the same band as Ygritte. He has an affinity for animals including his pet eagle. Orell is killed in the confrontation with [[Qhorin Halfhand]]'s scouting party, during which Orell is inhabiting his eagle. A portion of Orell's consciousness remains within the eagle, and develops a deep hatred of Jon. The eagle then aids Rattleshirt in tracking and capturing Jon and Qhorin and attacks Jon, scarring him.
